sentences.english: Liuyuxi is an outstanding statesman and exiling poem in middle of Tang Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 刘禹锡是中唐时期杰出的政治家兼贬谪诗人。

sentences.english: The verse performance of Yuxi Liu is combination of two kinds art style: "bold and unconstrained" and "lucid and attractive".
sentences.chinese: 刘禹锡的诗歌表现为豪健与清丽两种艺术风格的结合。

sentences.english: Chapter 2 will focus on analyzing the style of Liu Yuxi and Du Mu's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 第二章着重分析刘禹锡和杜牧的诗歌风格。
